name: solid-compound
description: Solid Compound is a software library/framework for the [Solid](https://solidproject.org/) ecosystem that allows Solid developers to easily build web applications that are compatible with the [Solid specification](https://solidproject.org/TR/protocol) but also offer a way to use the web applications in a "traditional" way (without Solid), meaning, where the application authenticates users and stores their data. With this library a developer can build web applications that have the capabilities to:
